name: Minecraft Console Client
author: Razboy20@razboy.dev
description: Runs a Console Client implementation of Minecraft in Pterodactyl.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash

cd /mnt/server

apk --no-cache add curl jk

JOBID=$(curl -s https://ci.appveyor.com/api/projects/ORelio/minecraft-console-client | jq -r ".build.jobs[0].jobId")

curl "https://ci.appveyor.com/api/buildjobs/${JOBID}/artifacts/MinecraftClient%2Fbin%2FRelease%2FMinecraftClient.exe" -Lo /mnt/server/MinecraftClient.exe
chmod +x /mnt/server/MinecraftClient.exe
